It has approximately 4,100 FTE of which 15-20% is currently outsourced. They goal is to increase the outsourcing percentage to 30% within the next 2-3 years. They field over 350 scrum teams supporting product and service line development under the CAI umbrella. CAPG uses a joint development model with supplier partners on scrum teams based both on-shore and off-shore/near-shore as needed. In 2019 CAPG worked with over 100 technology suppliers for both\\nsoftware product development and support and maintenance capabilities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"They expect their consolidated supplier base and Strategic Supplier Partners to help them:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Better scale resources to demand\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Quicken their delivery start up time\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Improve the efficiency and efficacy of their product development work\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reduce risk\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"They also expect to strengthen relationships with their strategic partners by providing increased scale and value with an increased share of their business portfolio.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":393967,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d97b1713-196a-451b-a675-80e3d1dd222f/image2020-3-22_16-58-32.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d97b1713-196a-451b-a675-80e3d1dd222f/image2020-3-22_16-58-32.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"image2020-3-22_16-58-32.png\",\"name\":\"image2020-3-22_16-58-32.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d97b1713-196a-451b-a675-80e3d1dd222f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":544.6044098573282},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":13208,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/02478739-8280-40ec-b8e7-3351f50e921e/6.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/02478739-8280-40ec-b8e7-3351f50e921e/6.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"6.JPG\",\"name\":\"6.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"02478739-8280-40ec-b8e7-3351f50e921e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":642,\"height\":58},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":72008,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/39a3f718-e54f-4bcc-be0e-849618eb285c/Capture3.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/39a3f718-e54f-4bcc-be0e-849618eb285c/Capture3.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capture3.JPG\",\"name\":\"Capture3.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"39a3f718-e54f-4bcc-be0e-849618eb285c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":951,\"height\":496},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Strategic Supplier would be responsible for measuring and providing monthly Delivery Performance Metrics (KPIs – see section 6 of the RFP Response Template, Appendix F for examples) and the tracking of initiatives for review at the Delivery Leadership Team meeting.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Strategic Supplier and CAI would jointly develop the report of SLAs (see section 6 of the RFP Response Template, Appendix F for examples), but the Strategic Supplier would be primarily responsible for running the meeting.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Strategic Supplier would primarily be responsible for developing the annual review deck in partnership with CAI, to review the previous year and develop the strategic plan for the next year.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Transition Team meetings would be led by the Strategic Supplier, providing updates during the meeting and bi-weekly status reports to executives.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":13124,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c094ffca-a1fc-47bd-98ec-37cd0452bda2/7.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c094ffca-a1fc-47bd-98ec-37cd0452bda2/7.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"7.JPG\",\"name\":\"7.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c094ffca-a1fc-47bd-98ec-37cd0452bda2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":644,\"height\":67},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following sprint level metrics are proposed as an initial way to measure the effectiveness of supplier scrum team tactical delivery as we begin to build the strategic relationship (exact measures will the partnership evolves, CAPG would like to understand how EPAM envision pricing model and performance metrics would evolve - what best practices would EPAM hope to implement with CPG?\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rBeyond traditional models (Time & Material, Fixed Price), EPAM can employ such innovative procurement strategies as:\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managed Services 2.0: Aligning Managed Services with IT/business outcomes e.g. for predictable cost or service optimization in transformations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pros: Agreed fixed cost for a service delivered controlled by SLAs, multi-year agreement with cost savings expectations, supplier is expected to own end to end asset delivery and technical decisions\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cons: Often limited to support services, wrong SLAs create “conflicting” priorities, difficult/timely to establish required SLAs, requires stable environment\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Key use cases: Cost-effective legacy modernization, application development & support for low-change areas, end-to-end product development\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managed Capacity: Committed team capacity for agile delivery combining stable teams with scale up/scale down options and rapid engagement. This is the basis for our alternate, Software Delivery Factory model proposal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pros: guaranteed capacity, comparatively low procurement overhead enabling fast ramp up/down of flex teams, productivity increase due to cross-training, shared risk model to ensure overall performance meets or exceeds expectations\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cons: less suitable for continuous short-term project work with changing technologies/required skills or frequent major scope changes\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Key use cases: Multi-Team Platform development, Agile at Scale e.g. SAFe, Product-centric delivery\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managed Output: Pricing based on discrete units of output such as Story Points, Test Cases, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pros: Vendor is compensated based on output produced, can be used in Agile environment\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cons: Requires stable environments and development processes; prior vendor experience in this area and valid historical team performance data is required\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Key use cases: app development in a stable application environment\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Outcome-based: Fees bound to business outcomes which are objectively measured and delivered (e.g. revenue increase or cost reduction)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pros: Roles and responsibilities are strictly defined, and ambiguity eliminated wherever possible with quantitative metrics and milestones; encourages the provider to exploit savings opportunities through shared knowledge of best process practices, standardization, and application life-cycle improvements\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cons: The exact function of IT contribution to business outcomes might be difficult to segregate; Requires objective, transparent (to both parties), measurable KPI’s; Requires clarity on the procedure when the client doesn’t follow required actions (e.g. FTE reduction) or when assumed outcomes were wrong\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Key use cases: Shared Risk & Return; projects with ability to define business outcomes and measure them (new revenue streams, cost optimization, operational KPI improvements).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":13888,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d0c68b1d-4b0b-445b-b3ae-513c5df9c9ea/8.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d0c68b1d-4b0b-445b-b3ae-513c5df9c9ea/8.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"8.JPG\",\"name\":\"8.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d0c68b1d-4b0b-445b-b3ae-513c5df9c9ea\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":641,\"height\":62.00000000000001},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ability
